fields.description:
Description:
Point Conversion crashes when tying to open the application. Crash only occurs on iPhone with beta version 6. 
This is not a regression. Behavior also occurs on 2.1.1. 

Steps:
1.Open BaseUI >Views >Point Conversion.

Expected results:
Application opens successfully.

Actual results:
Application crashes.
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Application crashes when trying to open "Point Conversion" (iOS 6 Beta 4)
fields.environment:
Tested on :
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208201549
Titanium SDK, build: 2.1.2.v20120824144611
Device:
iPhone 4S version 6 beta 4

comments.body:
This issue is seen on IOS6 beta 4 device with app built using iOS SDK version 5.1.

Tested using:
Ipad 3 iOS 6 beta 4
Iphone4S iOS 6 beta 4
SDK : 2.1.3.v20120904163110
Kitchensink built with iOS sdk 5.1
